title: Krazy Glue, Max Bond Gel, EZ Squeeze, 4 g
description: When You Need Extra-Strong, Extra-Quick Fixes, Trust Krazy Glue Max Bond. The Ultra-Thick, No-Run Gel Is Specially Designed To Fill Gaps In Porous Surfaces, Glue Vertical Or Mismatched Surfaces, And Create A Strong, Long-Lasting Bond. Trust This Super Glue To Bond Household Items Like Plastic, Ceramic, Wood, Rubber, Metal, Leather, And More. The Precise, Clog-Resistant Applicator And Ez Squeeze Bottle Provide Mess-Free Gluing. America's Super Glue Since 1973. Consumers Trust The Name They Know.
